name: jump-O
summary: jump-O is a minimalist game, with minimalist art, where you play as a circle in a square world. Jumping and moving at the right time, to avoid spikes and bullets, is the key to complete every single level.
info:
• 平台: ios
  • 游戏类型: puz
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2014-05-16
  • 官方网站: bytebrushers.com
